actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to extend crop insurance coverage under such act to all areas of the United States and to all agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to extend crop insurance coverage under such Act to all areas of the United States and to all agricultural commodities. Repeals the present ceiling on the amount authorized to be appropriated annually to the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to extend crop insurance coverage under such act to all areas of the United States and to all agricultural commodities.
